pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:1.2: At that time a woman who had previously belonged to the king’s harem had gone forth as a nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:1.3: Another nun who was plagued by discontent went to that nun and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc4:1.4: “Venerable, the king only came to you at long intervals.
